features: REGAIN CONTROL of unruly frizz by addressing the root problem. Our Perfect Smooth Shampoo has Potent Argan extract that works to promote a healthy scalp environment. Yuzu Ceremides guard against frizz and a deeply penetrating exotic oils blend offers long-lasting moisture.

TAME UNRULY STRANDS STARTING AT THE ROOTS: Get your scalp and hair back in healthy harmony with an infusion of long-lasting moisture from an exotic blend of antioxidant-rich oils, Japanese superfoods, and plant extracts.
VALUE SIZE - Each refill is equal to two full-size bottles. ECO-FRIENDLY - Each refill pouch contains 85% less plastic than two full-size bottles.
AROMA: Warm, freshly peeled Japanese yuzu. HOW TO USE: Lather into wet hair and rinse. Follow with your favorite NatureLab TOKYO conditioner.
NATURE-PERFECTED. Our plant-based formulas make use of ingredients that are safe, clean, and environmentally friendly. Free of Sulfates, Parabens, Phthalates, Mineral Oil, Gluten, and Animal Cruelty.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Perfect Smooth Shampoo Perfect Smooth Hair Oil Perfect Smooth Conditoner Perfect Smooth Blowout Lotion For Best Results Step 1 Step 2 Step 3 Step 4 Results You'll Love Offers long-lasting moisture to keep tresses tame Moisturizes from root to tip for long-lasting, frizz-free manageability Works to promote a healthy scalp Instantly separates and detangles tresses for silky-smooth results

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All Time Favorite Shampoo
reviews.reviewText: Have been using this shampoo for 2 years now. It has done wonders for my hair. Keeps it smooth, healthy, and looking better than any other shampoo I’ve used and I’m 66. Have used many of their products. Can’t say enough good things about Nature Lab!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am enjoying this product very much. It smells like a lemon, it makes my hair smooth and the packaging is great. I transfer the product into reusable plastic dispenser minimize the use of plastic containers.Thank you for your product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I love this shampoo!! I've been using for over a year and won't use anything else. My hair is super thick so this shampoo makes my hair have bounce, shine and keeps my color last longer. This shampoo has a clean scent not too strong, so it doesn't irritate my allergies. It's just a great shampoo without spending a lot of money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall I like it.
reviews.reviewText: The smell is great. It makes my hair less frizzy and soft. It doesn't weigh my hair down. I wish that the amount they gave was a little more in the bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn't work much for me and my Hair fell out alot after using it.
reviews.reviewText: Not really enjoying it, kinda boosts hair loss or atleast thats how i feel, after I shower I run my hands thru it and alot falls out. Sad because I kinda liked it but will have to try another, plus its way too expensive for the size, only used it like 5 to 6 times and the product is about half way probs bit less than half, my hair is wavy and medium length id say about 6 inches on top and 2 to 3 on sides. Didn't really feel like it did do much to my hair that I noticed 😕. Also bottles are small and almost 12 oz when others in the market are 17+ oz so you'll be spending alot in the long run specially for a 15$ price tag. Gonna have to just take a loss and throw them out. Bottles are cool though might use them for something else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried other clean brands of shampoos, every single one left my hair feeling greasy and almost like it was coated in wax. NOT this one!!! This one is amazing! Left my hair feeling soft and clean. I usually have to wash my hair every day, but with this one I am on day two of not washing! 10/10 recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broken pump and leaked in.transut
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner smells amazing and seems to work well. The problem is without a working pump (due to thickness of conditioner) it is very hard to get it out of the bottle. Also due to leak lost a fair amount of product in transit. Very disappointing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I am 45 years old. I have curly hair. I grew up in Singapore and now live in Florida; 2 extremely humid climates. I have been battling frizzy hair ALL my life, until now. This shampoo is a game changer. I never thought a shampoo could make such a difference. I used to invest money in conditioners, masques and styling products to battle frizz. With this shampoo, my hair care routine has been simplified. Twice a week, I wash with this shampoo, condition with NatureLab Hair Masque and style with Wen styling creme. That's all I need now. I get consistent results every time. It's no longer a guessing game as to how my hair will look when it's dry. Now, my hair is frizz-free, soft, manageable with a defined curl pattern, and never weighed down or greasy-looking. I used to hate my hair because the curls always looked so untidy and unhealthy from being so frizzy. At 45, I finally love my curls. I can't say that this will work for everyone. Sometimes, a little trial and error is required to get it right. This is my experience, and it's been an emotional one. Thank you, NatureLab.

So, I really liked the shampoo in the beginning I even bought more bottles like around 3-4 more. I ignored the fact that my hair started to be thinner and I lost a lot of hair during the period I was using it. I stopped using it, and I feel like I lose less hair comparing to the earlier times.But it could also be related to something else such as during the period I was using it I colored my hair ( not the roots, like only the ends) or I had a stressful period which can also be cause if it.What I really loved about this product is the smell and I felt like my hair is more softer than before. But seems like I have to say goodbye to it
